column4: i am a newb and have a few questions is there someone here who could help out in a private chat
how much memory do you have?
probably a little more than 2 GB then
swap size is kinda dependent on RAM, since you probably will be suspending/hibernating to disk
if you dont plan to do that you don't have to have swap at all really
suspending or hibernating your Linux machine
some people don't like to load everything each time they boot, so they suspend, BUT Linux is kinda crappy with suspend, it may or may not work for you
its very good idea to give the Windows installation its own partition
it means you need to use nspluginwrapper for Flash on x64
